statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ 6 \\ -3 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -8 \\ 1 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 36 \\ -24 \\ 12 \\ -48 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
